long_description: The Giro Lure snow helmet comes armed with a featherlight fit and crucial all-mountain details. Plush earpads and a fun color give the Lure a leg up on other women's helmets. Rigorously lab- and field-tested Super Fit(TM) engineering incorporates careful anatomic measurements and rider input to offer high-performance fit and comfort. Super Cool(TM) vents invite cool, fresh air into the helmet while pushing hot, stale air out; optimized vent shapes help regulate temperature to keep you feeling fresh. Thermostat(TM) ventilation control lets you adjust airflow instantly with a simple, low-profile control button on the outside of the helmet. Stack Vent(TM) design offers seamless integration of goggles and helmet ventilation; it aligns a helmet vent with your goggles' center vent, helping keep goggles clear. In-mold construction fuses a tough, ventilated polycarbonate shell with an impact-absorbing foam liner, resulting in a helmet that is lighter and cooler than many others. Roc Loc(R) 5 fit system provides a high level of comfort, stability, adjustability and weight savings; easily dial in fit tension and vertical position with a single hand. Compatible with after-market Giro audio systems (sold separately). The Giro Lure snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077 alpine ski and snowboard helmet standards.
